overview:
Retired Insurance Company Chairman and CEO. Songwriter and composer of instrumental background music compositions.

Studied Actuary Science at Drake University. After graduation, attended IBM programming schools and installed a insurance administrative computer system. Join Electronic Data Systems as a Senior systems engineer, designed and installed a variety of insurance company systems. Promoted to vice president of the beta division.

After leaving Electronic Data Systems, held title of Chief Information Officer and after a series of promotions retired as chairman and CEO.
